hints.content: When we skip count by tens,  we add $10$ to each number as we count.

Jon started with $875$,  so we need to add $10$ more to $875$.

$875 + 10 = 885$

The next number Jon will say is $885$.

Jon is still skip counting by ten so we need to add $10$ to $885$.

$885 + 10 = 895$

The next number Jon will say is $895$.

question.content:
Jon starts counting at $875$. He counts by tens.

**What two numbers does Jon count next?**
